TopicTitle: The Name Change Thread (WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!)

I need to change my user name to ComatoseJedi to match my youtube user name. I may be starting to make some game play vids as to match my youtube account.

Okay [@lynwoodm](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/91567-lynwoodm/), this changes your login, so don't forget to use the new name ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
